page.title: 19S-cum-B._Houses & Occupiers1
page.content: 1. 'Southlands' - Old farmhouse and buildings, house partly modernised, stabling and barn, 12 acres of land, haulage business ( mainly local coal deliveries ) and livery stable for horses. Widow with two children of school age and one younger. 2. 'White Berries' - Old house, both occupants are AOPs, husband works part time at Beckingham Post Office. 3. 'Yew Tree Farm'-Well modernised old cottage style farmhouse and outbuildings. Two adults and three children, one starting college this year and two at the local school. The two adults commute to Nottingham to work but now only part-time. 4.'The Paddocks'-New bungalow,couple with five grown up children, two still unmarried and living at home one working as long distance lorry driver at Newark and one at livery stable.
